title: Fix app initialization failure

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the application initialization failure that prevents the app from opening properly after Version 49 deployment. Check for runtime errors in App.tsx bootstrap flow, authentication state handling, and any breaking changes in the recent profile save fix.

quotes: app proper open nahi ho raha hai

acceptanceCriteria: Application loads successfully without blocking errors
User can access the login page or dashboard depending on authentication state
No console errors related to initialization or bootstrap flow

requirements.text: Add comprehensive error boundaries and loading state handling to catch and display any initialization failures gracefully, showing user-friendly error messages instead of blank screens.
acceptanceCriteria: Error boundary wraps main App component to catch render errors
Loading states display properly during bootstrap fetch
Network failures show clear error messages with retry options
Failed authentication attempts provide actionable feedback

requirements.text: Verify backend actor initialization and canister availability to ensure the app can successfully connect to the backend services.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister responds to health checks
Actor methods are accessible from frontend
No CORS or network connectivity issues
Bootstrap data fetch returns expected structure

constraints: Do not modify authentication hooks in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Preserve existing ProfileSetup component logic from Version 49
Maintain backward compatibility with existing user data
nonGoals: Redesigning the UI or user experience
